mapper.select: SELECT DS.BRDNO, DS.RENO, UF_DATETIME2STRING(DS.BRDDATE) BRDDATE, DS.TYPE AS extfield1 , TB.BRDTITLE FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT TB.BRDNO, TBL.BLNO RENO, TBL.BLDATE BRDDATE, TBL.USERNO, 'thumbs-o-up' as TYPE FROM TBL_BOARD TB LEFT OUTER JOIN TBL_BOARDREAD TBR ON TBR.BRDNO=TB.BRDNO AND TBR.USERNO=#{userno} INNER JOIN TBL_BOARDLIKE TBL ON TBL.BRDNO=TB.BRDNO WHERE BRDDELETEFLAG='N' AND TB.USERNO=#{userno} AND TBL.BLDATE > IF(TB.BRDDATE>IFNULL(TBR.READDATE,0), TB.BRDDATE, TBR.READDATE) UNION ALL SELECT BRDNO, RENO, BRDDATE, USERNO , IF((SELECT TBRE.BRDNO FROM TBL_BOARDREPLY TBRE WHERE TBRE.BRDNO=DS.BRDNO AND TBRE.USERNO=#{userno}) IS NULL, 'files-o', 'comments') TYPE FROM ( SELECT TB.BRDNO, TBRE.RENO, TBRE.REDATE BRDDATE, TBRE.USERNO FROM TBL_BOARD TB LEFT OUTER JOIN TBL_BOARDREAD TBR ON TBR.BRDNO=TB.BRDNO AND TBR.USERNO=#{userno} INNER JOIN TBL_BOARDREPLY TBRE ON TBRE.BRDNO=TB.BRDNO WHERE BRDDELETEFLAG='N' AND TB.USERNO=#{userno} AND TBRE.USERNO!=#{userno} AND TBRE.REDATE > IF(TB.BRDDATE>IFNULL(TBR.READDATE,0), TB.BRDDATE, TBR.READDATE) UNION SELECT TBR.BRDNO, TBRE.RENO, TBRE.REDATE BRDDATE, TBRE.USERNO FROM TBL_BOARDREPLY TBR INNER JOIN TBL_BOARDREAD TBRR ON TBR.BRDNO=TBRR.BRDNO INNER JOIN TBL_BOARDREPLY TBRE ON TBRE.BRDNO=TBR.BRDNO WHERE TBR.REDELETEFLAG='N' AND TBR.USERNO=#{userno} AND TBRR.USERNO=#{userno} AND TBRE.USERNO!=#{userno} AND TBRE.REDATE > TBRR.READDATE ) DS ORDER BY BRDDATE DESC LIMIT 5 ) DS INNER JOIN TBL_BOARD TB ON DS.BRDNO=TB.BRDNO ORDER BY DS.BRDDATE DESC

SELECT DS.BRDNO, DS.RENO, DATE_FORMAT(DS.BRDDATE,'%Y-%m-%d %h:%m') BRDDATE, DS.USERNO, DS.TYPE AS extfield1 , TB.BRDTITLE, TB.BRDLIKE, USERNM BRDWRITER , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TBL_BOARDREAD WHERE BRDNO=TB.BRDNO) BRDHIT , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TBL_BOARDREPLY WHERE BRDNO=TB.BRDNO AND REDELETEFLAG='N') REPLYCNT
FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT TB.BRDNO, TBL.BLNO RENO, TBL.BLDATE BRDDATE, TBL.USERNO, 'thumbs-o-up' as TYPE FROM TBL_BOARD TB LEFT OUTER JOIN TBL_BOARDREAD TBR ON TBR.BRDNO=TB.BRDNO AND TBR.USERNO=#{userno} INNER JOIN TBL_BOARDLIKE TBL ON TBL.BRDNO=TB.BRDNO WHERE BRDDELETEFLAG='N' AND TB.USERNO=#{userno} AND TBL.BLDATE > IF(TB.BRDDATE>IFNULL(TBR.READDATE,0), TB.BRDDATE, TBR.READDATE) UNION ALL SELECT BRDNO, RENO, BRDDATE, USERNO , IF((SELECT TBRE.BRDNO FROM TBL_BOARDREPLY TBRE WHERE TBRE.BRDNO=DS.BRDNO AND TBRE.USERNO=#{userno}) IS NULL, 'files-o', 'comments') TYPE FROM ( SELECT TB.BRDNO, TBRE.RENO, TBRE.REDATE BRDDATE, TBRE.USERNO FROM TBL_BOARD TB LEFT OUTER JOIN TBL_BOARDREAD TBR ON TBR.BRDNO=TB.BRDNO AND TBR.USERNO=#{userno} INNER JOIN TBL_BOARDREPLY TBRE ON TBRE.BRDNO=TB.BRDNO WHERE BRDDELETEFLAG='N' AND TB.USERNO=#{userno} AND TBRE.USERNO!=#{userno} AND TBRE.REDATE > IF(TB.BRDDATE>IFNULL(TBR.READDATE,0), TB.BRDDATE, TBR.READDATE) UNION SELECT TBR.BRDNO, TBRE.RENO, TBRE.REDATE BRDDATE, TBRE.USERNO FROM TBL_BOARDREPLY TBR INNER JOIN TBL_BOARDREAD TBRR ON TBR.BRDNO=TBRR.BRDNO INNER JOIN TBL_BOARDREPLY TBRE ON TBRE.BRDNO=TBR.BRDNO WHERE TBR.REDELETEFLAG='N' AND TBR.USERNO=#{userno} AND TBRR.USERNO=#{userno} AND TBRE.USERNO!=#{userno} AND TBRE.REDATE > TBRR.READDATE ) DS ORDER BY BRDDATE DESC ) DS INNER JOIN TBL_BOARD TB ON DS.BRDNO=TB.BRDNO INNER JOIN COM_USER CU ON CU.USERNO=DS.USERNO ORDER BY DS.BRDDATE DESC

SELECT DS.BRDNO, DATE_FORMAT(DS.BRDDATE,'%Y-%m-%d %h:%m') BRDDATE, DS.TYPE extfield1 , TB.BRDTITLE, BGNAME, USERNM BRDWRITER , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TBL_BOARDREAD WHERE BRDNO=TB.BRDNO) BRDHIT , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TBL_BOARDREPLY WHERE BRDNO=TB.BRDNO AND REDELETEFLAG='N') REPLYCNT FROM ( SELECT TB.BRDNO, BRDDATE, 'files-o' as TYPE FROM TBL_BOARD TB WHERE BRDDELETEFLAG='N' AND TB.USERNO=#{searchExt1} UNION ALL SELECT TBR.BRDNO, TBR.REDATE BRDDATE, 'comments' as TYPE FROM TBL_BOARDREPLY TBR WHERE TBR.REDELETEFLAG='N' AND TBR.USERNO=#{searchExt1} ORDER BY BRDDATE DESC ) DS INNER JOIN TBL_BOARD TB ON DS.BRDNO=TB.BRDNO INNER JOIN TBL_BOARDGROUP TBG ON TBG.BGNO=TB.BGNO INNER JOIN COM_USER CU ON CU.USERNO=TB.USERNO LIMIT ${rowStart-1}, 10
